name: Ilham Yahya Mahendra- Student Electronic Engineering
description: Active student in Electrical Engineering at Politeknik Negeri Semarang, possessing skills in the installation, repair, and maintenance of electrical systems. He demonstrates strong analytical and problem-solving abilities, which enable him to design, develop, and implement effective technical solutions. Ilham is actively involved in research projects and has gained practical experience in utilizing both hardware and software. He is prepared to contribute to a dynamic work environment and is eager to be part of innovative projects that drive technological advancement.
